singleResult

public static <T,E extends java.lang.Exception> Optional<T> singleResult(info.aduna.iteration.CloseableIteration<T,E> theIter)
                                throws E extends java.lang.Exception
Return the first result of the iteration. If the Iteration is empty or null, the Optional will be absent. The Iteration is closed whether or not there is a result.

Parameters:
theIter - the iteration
Returns:
an Optional containing the first result of the iteration, if present.
Throws:
E
E extends java.lang.Exception

                                                     throws E extends java.lang.Exception
